pages.text: This butterfly can only be found in $(#e6b800)sunflower plains$(). A player can lure the  buttergold towards them using $(#e6b800)dandelions$(). When put into a bottle below a couldron with milk, $(#e6b800)the buttergold will turn the milk into butter$(), which can be harvested to grand the player a block of butter. The wings of the buttergold can be used to craft a single piece of $(#e6b800)butter.$()
pages.title: Buttergold
